heading: Fashion Brunch
description: The Event: Fashion brunch in support of the 1000+ club to benefit cancer Inc.The Cause: The Colonnade Outlets at Sawgrass Mills hosted an intimate fashion brunch at Villagio Ristorante as a preview to the 1000+ Club to Benefit Cancer Inc.'s Women of the Year Luncheon. Charitable fashionistas sipped mimosas, bid on designer goods and enjoyed apparel courtesy of Bloomingdale's – The Outlet Store, Neiman Marcus Last Call, Piazza Sempione, St. John Outlet and more.
